newsitem.title: USA: Tolls on I-95 at Md./Del. border cut for holiday.
newsitem.headline: Tolls on I-95 at Md./Del. border cut for holiday.

text.p: Tolls on Interstate 95 at the Maryland-Delaware border will be cut to $1 from $1.25 for the Memorial Day weekend, said Delaware Department of Transportation.
Toll collection is always a problem during heavy travel periods, and officials said the $1 tolls help speed passage though toll plazas since many drivers won't need to wait for change.
Reduced tolls will be in effect Friday and Monday, from 0700 EDT until 2300 EDT.
